name: ProLounger_Tuff_Stuff_White_Synthetic_Leather_Power_Lift_Chair_Wall_Hugger_Recliner
reviews: This chair is wonderfully comfortable and easy to use. My friend was seriously injured and needed to stay with me. It was nearly impossible for him to get out of a bed or chair, and he was able to sleep in this recliner. I had been looking for a new recliner anyway, and this one looks great in my shabby chic living room. The small footprint is a bonus. We had it out of the box and fully set up in under 15 minutes. And Overstock delivered it in 3 days. Thank you!
description: The ProLounger lift recliner is covered in TUFF STUFF, a synthetic leather in stylish white color. This recliner makes getting out of your seat a breeze with the included wired power control and the wall hugger design only needs 4-inches of clearance from the wall to recline or lift and uses less floor space when reclining.Frame materials: Constructed with a laminated hardwood frame for added strengthUpholstery color: WhiteUpholstery materials: 100-percent polyurethane with a poly blend baseThe wired controller has 2 easy to use buttons for lifting or reclining, simply hold the button until your comfort level is reachedThe side pocket holds the wired controller in place so you’ll never lose track of it95 inch power cord is UL approvedFull chaise pad between the chair and the leg rest to support the legs for a truly comfortable reclinerCushions are filled with high density foam, polyester fiber and independently wrapped pocket coilsSteel reclining mechanismInsulated spring clips for noise reductionOur efficient product and package design allows us to use less fossil fuel throughout the entire supply chain than standard, set-up furniture usesVarious components are recyclable at the end of useShips in 1 boxTakes less than 15 minutes to assembleDimensions: 42 inches high x 29 inches wide x 38 inches deepSeat: 19.5 inches high x 22 inches wide x 22 inches deepFurniture Pattern: SolidProduct Features: Power Lift, Power ReclineChair Type: Recliners, Theater SeatingMaterial: PolyurethaneStyle: TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredColor: WhiteStyleTransitionalMaterialPolyurethaneChair TypeRecliners, Theater SeatingAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorWhiteFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesPower Lift, Power Recline
